text: The Dodge Nitro was a compact SUV that was built by Chrysler's Dodge brand. The Nitro has had 2 generations with the second one being built in 2011. The Nitro has been built since 2006 and made its debut in February of 2005 at the Chicago Auto Show. The Nitro was designed by Dennis Myles. The Nitro was discontinued in 2012. ==Other websites== *Dodge Nitro at dodge.ca Category:Dodge automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Dodge Nitro
